item.title: Python: Stock price forecast #1
item.description: #Get tweets Overview There are two methods for making investment decisions in stock investment: technical analysis and fundamentals analysis. This time we will deal with the technical analysis. Predict the Nikkei Stock Average using Twitter. First, I will explain the general flow. 1, Get the past tweets of an account from Twitter using TwitterAPI. 2. Use the polar dictionary to analyze the sentiment of daily tweets. 3, Get the time series data of Nikkei 225.
